alert.note: Alert for Vinton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 8:46PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Vinton County through 930 PM EDT... At 846 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Hocking Hills State Park, or 11 miles northwest of Mcarthur, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mcarthur, Lake Hope State Park, Zaleski, Creola, Allensville and Eagle Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
